title: Make Good On Your Promise | The Wake Up
description:
Ryan discusses what we can learn from Martin Luther King Jr. about living philosophically, and reads this week’s meditation from The Daily Stoic Journal, on today’s Daily Stoic Podcast.

Eight Sleep is the most advanced solution on the market for thermoregulation. It pairs dynamic cooling and heating with biometric tracking. Go to eightsleep.com/dailystoic to check out the Pod Pro Cover and save $150 at checkout.

Sign up for the Daily Stoic email: https://DailyStoic.com/email

Follow us: Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, TikTok, and Facebook
